metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5616 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Ubuntu, gnome-control-center did not properly reflect SSH remote loginstatus when the system was configured to use systemd socket activation foropenssh-server. This could unknowingly leave the local machine exposed toremote SSH access contrary to expectation of the user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5616` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnome-control-center - 1:44.0-1ubuntu6.1
gnome-control-center-data - 1:44.0-1ubuntu6.1
gnome-control-center-faces - 1:44.0-1ubuntu6.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnome-control-center package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:44.0-1ubuntu6.1').
